generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, with cars parked along its sides.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by curbs and poles, and on the left side near the parked cars.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including residential houses on the left and a commercial building with a Mercedes-Benz sign on the right.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are present along the sidewalks and in front of the buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- car: Several cars are parked along the sides of the road, and a black van is driving in the middle of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the Mercedes-Benz sign and traffic signs.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
